1001.name: Control - A
1001.desc: <color=#FF9500>10</color>-meter firing range, deals <color=#FF9500>230%</color> single-target DMG every <color=#FF9500>3</color>s. Reduces the movement speed of enemies hit by <color=#FF9500>35%</color> for <color=#FF9500>2.5</color>s.
1001.title: Enhance the drone

1002.name: Control - A1
1002.desc: <color=#FF9500>12</color>-meter firing range, deals <color=#FF9500>350%</color> single-target DMG every <color=#FF9500>3</color>s. Reduces the movement speed of enemies hit by <color=#FF9500>35%</color> for <color=#FF9500>2.5</color>s.
1002.title: Select Drone Branch

1003.name: Control - AoE
1003.desc: <color=#FF9500>12</color>-meter firing range, deals <color=#FF9500>50%</color> AoE DMG every second. Reduces the movement speed of enemies within range by <color=#FF9500>35%</color> for <color=#FF9500>2.5</color>s.
1003.title: Select the drone to be enhanced

1004.name: Control - Frost
1004.desc: <color=#FF9500>12</color>-meter firing range, launches a frost bomb every <color=#FF9500>8</color>s that deals <color=#FF9500>500%</color> AoE DMG to everything within a <color=#FF9500>4</color>-meter radius. Enemies hit are frozen for <color=#FF9500>3</color>s.
1004.title: Select the drone to be enhanced

1005.name: Control - Dissolution
1005.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>3</color>, deals more DMG the lower the enemy's HP gets. The enemy takes an additional <color=#FF9500>1%</color>, <color=#FF9500>2%</color>, or <color=#FF9500>3%</color> DMG respectively for every <color=#FF9500>1%</color> HP they lose.
desc_battle: Deals more DMG with lower HP
Deals more DMG with lower HP
Deals more DMG with lower HP

1006.name: Control - Confusion
1006.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>2</color>. Confuses enemies within range every <color=#FF9500>25</color> and <color=#FF9500>15</color>s respectively for <color=#FF9500>5</color>s.

1007.name: Control - Defrosting
1007.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>3</color>. The enemy takes an additional <color=#FF9500>300%</color>, <color=#FF9500>600%</color>, and <color=#FF9500>900%</color> DMG respectively when unfrozen.
desc_battle: Enemy takes Medium DMG when unfrozen
Enemy takes High DMG when unfrozen
Enemy takes Highest DMG when unfrozen

1008.name: Control - Iciness
1008.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>2</color>. Expands the range of effect of frost bombs to <color=#FF9500>6</color> meters and <color=#FF9500>8</color> meters respectively.
desc_battle: Slightly expands the AoE Freeze range
Greatly expands the AoE Freeze range

1009.name: Attack - B
1009.desc: <color=#FF9500>10</color>-meter firing range, deals <color=#FF9500>180%</color> single-target DMG every <color=#FF9500>1.5</color>s.
1009.title: Enhance the drone

1010.name: Attack - B1
1010.desc: <color=#FF9500>12</color>-meter firing range, deals <color=#FF9500>250%</color> single-target DMG every <color=#FF9500>1.5</color>s.
1010.title: Select Drone Branch

1011.name: Attack - Flame
1011.desc: <color=#FF9500>12</color>-meter firing range, launches a fire bomb every <color=#FF9500>6</color>s that deals <color=#FF9500>500%</color> AoE DMG to everything within a <color=#FF9500>5</color>-meter radius.
1011.title: Select the drone to be enhanced

1012.name: Attack - Sniper
1012.desc: <color=#FF9500>20</color>-meter firing range. Snipes an enemy every <color=#FF9500>8</color>s, dealing <color=#FF9500>2000%</color> single-target DMG with priority given to elite targets.
1012.title: Select the drone to be enhanced
desc_battle: Very High DMG & Super-long range & Long intervals

1013.name: Attack - Burning
1013.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>3</color>. When fire bombs hit the enemy, adds a Lv. <color=#FF9500>1</color>, <color=#FF9500>2</color>, and <color=#FF9500>3</color> Scorch respectively for <color=#FF9500>12</color>s.

1014.name: Attack - Assault
1014.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>2</color>. Launches additional <color=#FF9500>1</color> and <color=#FF9500>2</color> fire bombs respectively.

1015.name: Attack - Overload
1015.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>3</color>. Increases sniping speed, changing the interval between attacks to <color=#FF9500>7</color>, <color=#FF9500>6</color>, and <color=#FF9500>5</color>s respectively.

1016.name: Attack - Marking
1016.desc: Maximum device level of <color=#FF9500>2</color>. Attacks mark the target, increasing the DMG it takes by <color=#FF9500>50%</color> and <color=#FF9500>100%</color> respectively for <color=#FF9500>3</color>s.
desc_battle: Increases the target's DMG taken by 50%
Increases the target's DMG taken by 100%
